content: be empty step 13 cast on 2 sts using the cable cast on 8 sts step 14 cast off the first 4 sts you should have 1 stitch on the rh needle 4 sts step 15 repeat steps 12 to 14 2 sts step 16 repeat step 12 step 17 k2tog 1 st bind off christmas pudding bauble copyright © 2014 amanda berry page 3 of 3
